name: Crop Extractor
description:
An attempt at delving into the Serious Games genre by making an interactive data visualisation model about possibly showing a correlation between crop produce and temperatures for each country on a yearly basis.

You control a being that can fly through space around a 3D model of the earth with the ability to go forward or backwards in time. You can observe each country's temperatures by aiming at them. Each country displays a colour that is relative to their respective temperature. You can shoot an extractor blast into a country to extract low-poly crops. Crops are displayed by propelling themselves into their respective orbits with zero gravity physics. There are a total of 3 orbits with each one signifying the size and quantity of the produce with the inner one being the smallest and the outer one being the largest (10k -> 100k -> 1 mil per model, the bigger the model the higher the quantity). 

All controls are displayed on the menu.
